title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\ContainerSpec
name: ContainerSpec
description:
The spec of a Container.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.ContainerSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.image_uri
params.description: Required. The URI of a container image in the Container Registry that is to be run on each worker replica.

params.name: data.command
params.description: The command to be invoked when the container is started. It overrides the entrypoint instruction in Dockerfile when provided.

params.name: data.args
params.description: The arguments to be passed when starting the container.

params.name: data.env
params.description: Environment variables to be passed to the container. Maximum limit is 100.
